title: Life's a Witch
description: When life gives you lemons, some would say make lemonade.Amber knows all about making lemonade. More than she wants to. But what do you do when you discover--out of the clear blue--that you've got a destiny you could have only imagined. As a writer, Amber's got quite an imagination--but even she didn't imagine what was to come!What do you do when a sexy cop seems to be flirting with you? When strange things begin to happen? Strange objects show up? What do you do when you discover you're not the only child you'd always believed you were?Things are about to change drastically for Amber. Sometimes, Life's a Witch!Karma's Witches Are Here!Three authors have teamed together to write this series, and they invite you to join them in Karma...where Life's a Witch. Book 2, Love's a Witch, is coming soon by Hope Welsh Book 3, Karma's a Witch, will follow by Lanie Jordan
author: Elizabeth A. Reeves
